title: Identification of taurine biomarker in human biofluids using plasmonic patterns of silver nanostructure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20410-20419
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03575E, Paper

Farnaz Bahavarnia, Hamed Bahari, Mohammad Hasanzadeh, Nasrin Shadjou
A new paper-based photochemical method using TA-AgNPs as optical probe was developed to detect taurine in human blood plasma and urine samples.
